responsibilities: Design, develop, and implement data pipelines and ETL processes using Microsoft Azure technologies.
Automate manual processes and optimize data delivery.
Ensure data quality through data governance and code development best practices.
Assist in the design and development of data models and schemas.
Work cross-functionally with stakeholders to support their data infrastructure requirements.
skills: Proficiency in a scripting language such as Python.
Proficiency in SQL for writing complex, optimized queries.
Experience with APIs, data modeling, ETL/ELT, and data warehousing.
Ability to collaborate with and learn from multi-disciplinary teams.
Interest in adapting to and learning emerging technologies.
analysis:
The job responsibilities focus on designing, developing, and implementing data pipelines and ETL processes using Microsoft Azure technologies, automating processes, optimizing data delivery, and ensuring data quality. The responsibilities also include re-designing infrastructure for scalability, assisting in data model and schema design, and working cross-functionally with stakeholders to support data infrastructure requirements. The skills required include proficiency in scripting languages like Python, SQL for complex queries, experience with APIs, data modeling, ETL/ELT, data warehousing, problem-solving, communication, collaboration, and an interest in emerging technologies.

There is no explicit mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) in the responsibilities or skills. The focus is primarily on data engineering, data infrastructure, and related technologies. While there is an interest in emerging technologies, this is too broad and does not specifically indicate involvement with GenAI or LLMs.
